resources.string: What genre are you listening to?
Welcome, Mood N Music helps you reflect on your mood based on the type of music you listen to by gathering information about the two and displaying it in a visually appealing way.
On the Input Data page, select a smiley according to your mood to register it.
After registering your mood you can select the genre you are listening to from a dropdown list.
After enough data has been gathered, it will be visualised in the Your Data tab, which can be accessed by swiping or tapping on Your Data.
NOTE: Data visualization will appear, after enough data has been gathered.
